```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(bayesm)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(fastDummies)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
mscr = read.csv("mscr_merge.csv")
nls = read.csv("NLS.csv")
nls = nls[-1,]
for (i in 1:ncol(nls)){
  nls[,i] = as.numeric(nls[,i])
}
```

```{r}
df = full_join(mscr, nls, by='caseid')
df
write.csv(df, 'merge.csv', row.names=FALSE)
```
